casebody.data:
ACRO SERVICE CORPORATION, Plaintiff,
v.
NEW JERSEY DIVISION OF PURCHASE AND PROPERTY and 22nd Century Technologies, Inc., Defendants. M-249 September Term 2018
081310 Supreme Court of New Jersey. November 2, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion of the American Staffing Association, New Jersey Staffing Alliance, Industrial Staffing Services, Inc., Medical Staffing Services, Inc., System One Holdings LLC f/d/b/a Joule Staffing Solutions, Apidel Technologies, LLC, Alois LLC, and US Tech Solutions, Inc. for leave to appear as amicus curiae is denied.
